Key Match Events: Lisandro Martinez scored an own goal after four minutes
Nicholas Hagen skewed a clearance to Lionel Messi's feet, allowing him to score an easy goal
Lautaro Martinez converted a penalty to give Argentina the lead after 39 minutes
Lionel Messi and Lautaro Martinez combined for three of the four Argentina goals
Lionel Messi bagged a fourth goal to kill the game for good
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Messi was up to his usual tricks
Lautaro Martinez might have played his way into the starting XI next week
Lionel Scaloni will be disappointed to see his team concede so early, but take heart from the quick recovery
